dsOverview.title: ECMWF TOGA Global Supplementary Fields, 1985-2010

summary.p: This dataset contains supplementary output grids from the ECMWF operational model. These grids are on a gaussian grid (N80) with approximately a 1.125 degree resolution.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: ECMWF > European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

access.p: We are allowed to distribute this data to US scientists, scientists visiting US organizations, and Canadian scientists affiliated with UCAR member organizations only.

usage.p: This data must not be used for commercial purposes. ECMWF must be given credit in any publications in which this data is used.
